# MLImageClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData.dictionary(_:)

**Case**

A validation dataset represented by a dictionary.

## Declaration

```swift
case dictionary([String : [URL]])
```

## Designating validation data

- **MLImageClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData.split(strategy:)**: A validation dataset derived by randomly selecting a portion of the image classifier’s training dataset using the split strategy.
- **MLImageClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData.dataSource(_:)**: A validation dataset represented by a data source.
- **MLImageClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData.none**: An empty validation dataset that skips the model validation phase after training.

items.description: A validation dataset derived by randomly selecting a portion of the image classifier’s training dataset using the split strategy.
